name: FakaHeda fórum – Modrý styl
description: Fórum Fakaheda.eu se stylem do podoby webu
css: @-moz-document domain("forum.fakaheda.eu"){html{background-color:transparent;}body{background:url(https://fhforum.nejento.eu/forumstyle/bg.png) repeat-x #000;background-position-y:153px }#wrap{background-color:#eee;border:0 }#header-subsilver{background-image:url(https://fhforum.nejento.eu/forumstyle/header.png);background-repeat:repeat-x;border-bottom:1px solid transparent }#site-description{width:100%;text-align:right }#site-description h1{color:#eee;margin-top:20px }#site-description p{color:#888 }.logo{padding:0 }.search-header{margin-right:0;margin-top:-60px;box-shadow:none }.imageset.site_logo{background-image:url(https://fhforum.nejento.eu/forumstyle/logo.png) }.navbar{background:#383838;padding:5px 20px;border-radius:10px }ul.linklist li.responsive-menu a.responsive-menu-link:before{border-color:#eee }ul.linklist li.responsive-menu a.responsive-menu-link:hover:before,ul.linklist li.responsive-menu.visible a.responsive-menu-link:before{border-color:#61b0db }#nav-main li a,.breadcrumbs .crumb:before,.navbar li,.navbar li a{color:#eee;font-weight:300 }.navbar-top{background-image:url(https://fhforum.nejento.eu/forumstyle/navbar.png);padding:0 25px;background-repeat:no-repeat }.header_settings a,.notification_text{color:#105289!important }.chatform strong,.forabg .header a,li.header dd,li.header dt{color:#fff }#nav-main .dropdown .dropdown-contents{border-radius:0 0 5px 5px;background:#070707;border-color:#13598a;border-top:0 }ul.linklist .dropdown{top:12px }.dropdown .pointer,.dropdown .pointer-inner{border-bottom:0;border-left:0;border-right:0 }.body-blok-h3 h3,.forumbg,.topiclist{background:#2f3438;background:-moz-linear-gradient(top,#2f3438 0,#050505 89%,#419fc1 90%,#115688 100%);background:-webkit-linear-gradient(top,#2f3438 0,#050505 89%,#419fc1 90%,#115688 100%);background:linear-gradient(to bottom,#2f3438 0,#050505 89%,#419fc1 90%,#115688 100%);color:#fff }.forabg .header a:hover{color:#3d99bc;text-decoration:none }#subsilver-nav-topic .postbody,#subsilver-nav-topic .postprofile,.forumbg thead a,.forumbg thead tr th,.panel-container .panel li.header dd,.panel-container .panel li.header dt,.topiclist .header{color:#fff }.body-blok-h3 h3,ul.topiclist{border-radius:10px 10px 0 0 }.body-blok,.codebox_plus_wrap,.cp-mini,.forabg,.forumbg,.panel,ul.topiclist.topics{border-radius:10px }ul.topiclist li:last-child{border-radius:0 0 10px 10px }ul.forums{background-color:transparent }.forabg[style="opacity: 0.3;"] ul.topiclist,.forabg[style="opacity: 0.3;"] ul.topiclist .header{border-radius:10px!important;-moz-transition:all .51s;-o-transition:all .51s;-webkit-transition:all .51s;transition:all .51s }.chat .button{font-size:1em }div.rules{background-color:rgba(233,30,30,.2);padding:6px;font-size:1.2em;border-radius:10px;border:1px solid }#subsilver-nav-topic{border-radius:10px 10px 0 0;background:#2f3438;background:-moz-linear-gradient(top,#2f3438 0,#050505 89%,#419fc1 90%,#115688 100%);background:-webkit-linear-gradient(top,#2f3438 0,#050505 89%,#419fc1 90%,#115688 100%);background:linear-gradient(to bottom,#2f3438 0,#050505 89%,#419fc1 90%,#115688 100%);color:#fff }.postbody{width:86%;float:right }.postprofile{margin:5px 0 10px;width:12%;float:left;display:block }.leftsided.postprofile.subsilver-topic-author{width:12% }.leftsided.subsilver-topic-title{width:88% }.post{border-radius:0 0 10px 10px }#topicreview .post,#topicreview .post~.post,#viewfolder .post,#viewfolder .post~.post,.post#preview,.post~.post,.search.post,blockquote{border-radius:10px }.search .postprofile{width:15% }.search .postbody{width:84% }#format-buttons{margin:5px 0 2px }ul.topiclist.cplist{border-radius:0 0 10px 10px }#postform .post .postbody{width:100% }.topiclist .header{border-radius:10px 10px 0 0!important;background:#2f3438;background:-moz-linear-gradient(top,#2f3438 0,#050505 89%,#419fc1 90%,#115688 100%);background:-webkit-linear-gradient(top,#2f3438 0,#050505 89%,#419fc1 90%,#115688 100%);background:linear-gradient(to bottom,#2f3438 0,#050505 89%,#419fc1 90%,#115688 100%) }dl.details dt{text-align:left;width:15% }.left-box.profile-details{width:90%;margin-left:20px }.panel .inner .postbody{float:none }.left-box.details{margin-left:10px }.forumbg thead a:hover{color:#61b0db;text-decoration:none }.forumbg .responsive{border:0 }blockquote{background-color:rgba(56,145,182,.15);border:2px solid #d6d6d6;padding:5px 5px 2px 8px }.pollbar1,.pollbar2,.pollbar3,.pollbar4,.pollbar5{border-bottom-color:#419fc1;border-right-color:#419fc1 }.codebox,.spoiler{border-radius:10px;padding:5px }.codebox_plus_wrap{border-radius:10px;padding:2px 5px 0 8px }blockquote cite{font-size:1em;font-weight:700 }.pollbar1{background-color:#165e8e;border-radius:3px }.pollbar2{background-color:#1172B1 }.pollbar3{background-color:#208BD0 }.pollbar4{background-color:#58AFE8 }.pollbar5{background-color:#7FC0EA }}
